item.title: Implement a secure MCP server using OAuth and Entra ID
item.description: The article shows how to implement a secure model context protocol (MCP) server using OAuth and Entra ID. The MCP server is implemented using ASP.NET Core and uses Microsoft Entra ID to secure the API.
